product_name: The North Face Santiago Down Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Weighing just under a pound and easily compressing into its own front pocket, the North Face Santiago down jacket packs lots of warmth while taking up little room. Durable nylon/polyester fabric with 600-fill down insulation; petite quilting keeps down from shifting. Zip handwarmer pockets. The North Face Santiago down jacket has elastic cuffs and hem to seal out cold. Closeout.
short_description: Weighing just under a pound and easily compressing into its own front pocket, the North Face Santiago down jacket packs lots of warmth while taking up little room.
